seo.title: Juan Pablo Machado | Software Developer with 3 years of experience
seo.description: I'm a software developer with 3 years of professional experience. I like to develop challenging projects. Let's work together!
seo.tags: juan pablo machado, software developer, full stack developer, frontend developer, backend developer, portfolio, typescript, javascript, next.js, react, node.js, express.js, artificial intelligence

hero.description-1: I have <u>3 years of work experience</u>.
hero.description-2: I really like to create innovative solutions that add value and promote my professional growth.
hero.description-3: Thinking in a project? Let's work together!
hero.image-alt: Photo of Juan Machado with crossed arms

experience.title: Experience
experience.description: During my 3 years of professional experience, I have worked with wonderful companies and teams, where I have been able to contribute and learn from each one.

tasks: Design and build modular and scalable architectures, developing RESTful APIs connected to SQL and NoSQL databases, integrating AI solutions, geo-location, multimedia processing, payment gateways, and authentication.

Develop responsive and accessible web interfaces using React.js, applying usability and performance principles, and creating reusable components to enhance user experience and simplify code maintenance.
Develop robust backend applications with Node.js and Django, managing business logic, security, and data persistence using serverless backend tools.
Implement cloud solutions with AWS and Firebase services, setting up automated deployment environments with CI/CD pipelines to enable fast and reliable deliveries.

Lead fullstack solution development, working closely with designers, developers, and creatives to define features, optimize processes, and ensure the delivery of scalable, efficient, and high-quality products.
Develop and maintain web scrappers in Node.js for extracting and interpreting information across platforms, optimizing data flow.
Create Python automations for daily tasks, achieving a significant reduction of over 90% in execution times and boosting productivity.
Write advanced SQL database queries to extract specific data, supporting analysis and decision-making.
Create dashboards with automated charts in Tableau and Mixpanel facilitating data analysis.

projects.title: Projects
projects.description: I have been working the last 4 years on impactful projects which have improved my knowledge and skills by enhancing my expertise and my professional growth.

vocablo.description: Vocabulary and grammar learning, note your own words and generate AI-driven lessons to practice them.

trainant.description: Detailed control and creation of workout routines, weight and repetition tracking, exercise visualization.

jumping-planet.description: 2D platform game where players jump between planets to reach their spaceship before oxygen depletes.

trello-clone.description: Manage your workflow by creating Kanban boards to organize your tasks in a Trello-like web application.

game-blog.description: Search, add, visualize or rate your favorite video games in a blog-style web application.

budget-manager.description: Visualize and manage your budget by tracking your incomes and expenses effectively.

unsplash-clone.description: Search, visualize, upload and download images using the definitive web application clone of Unsplash.

journal-book.description: Write your own journal, visualize daily entries and notes created in your personal book.

autonite.description: Manage purchases, sales, inventory and human resources while visualizing detailed reports with charts.

about.title: About me
about.description-1: My name is Juan Pablo, I'm from Bogotá, Colombia!
about.description-2: I started my programming journey in 2020 by developing a game in Unity. Then, I moved to web development and completed my technical degree in analysis and development of information systems.
about.description-3: During my career, I have managed to work on various innovative and creative projects. I'm particularly proud of my contribution in the development of a project for a United Nations NGO focused on promoting sustainable development and public transparency.
about.description-4: As a software developer, my goal is to keep creating effective solutions for real-word problems, always open to learning new things and improving my tech and personal skills.
about.image-alt: Selfie of Juan Machado looking straight ahead

footer.title: Let's get in touch!
footer.description-1: Feel free to contact me regarding any project.
footer.description-2: I'm always open to new challenges and collaborations.
